mapper.select: SELECT distinct b.Post_num, b.Post_writer, u.User_score, b.Post_title, b.Post_like, b.Board_code, (SELECT count(*) FROM Comment WHERE Post_num = b.post_num) AS Comment_cnt, b.Post_view, b.Post_cr_date FROM Board AS b LEFT OUTER JOIN User AS u ON b.Post_writer = u.User_nickname LEFT OUTER JOIN Comment AS c ON b.Post_num = c.Post_num ORDER BY b.Post_cr_date DESC;
